finorza-inference.option.rendering.obser:
Configures the output size of observation frames.
%1$s: Resizes the observation frames to 640x360, matching MineRL's behavior.
%2$s: Resizes the observation frames to ACT-RViT's input size.
%3$s: Sends observation frames in the native window resolution with no resizing.
finorza-inference.option.rpc.compressObs: Compress the response returned by /Observe using gzip, reducing bytes sent over network but increasing CPU usage. This can be particularly useful if you set %1$s to %2$s and are rendering at a high native resolution.
finorza-inference.option.world.synchroni: Ticks the integrated server on each observation request, allowing the game to run faster than real time. Useful for evaluating agent performance.
